definition.en: Wrinkles are lines and creases that form in the skin as a natural part of aging. They occur when the skin loses elasticity and collagen production decreases, making the skin thinner and less able to retain moisture.
definition.th: ริ้วรอย คือเส้นและรอยยับที่เกิดขึ้นบนผิวหนังเป็นส่วนหนึ่งของการเสื่อมสภาพตามธรรมชาติ เกิดจากผิวหนังสูญเสียความยืดหยุ่นและการผลิตคอลลาเจนลดลง ทำให้ผิวบางลงและกักเก็บความชุ่มชื้นได้น้อยลง

causes: Natural aging process (decreased collagen and elastin)
Repeated facial expressions (smile lines, frown lines)
Loss of fat and bone structure with age
Environmental pollution and free radical damage
prevention: Wear protective clothing and hats in sun
Avoid tanning beds and excessive sun exposure
Sleep on back to avoid compression wrinkles
Eat diet rich in fruits, vegetables, omega-3
Manage stress and get adequate sleep (7-9 hours)

fine_lines.description: Early wrinkles, superficial lines visible with facial movements or expressions

moderate.description: Visible lines at rest, deeper expression lines (crow's feet, forehead lines)

severe.description: Deep wrinkles, significant volume loss, sagging skin, permanent creases

whenToSeeDermatologist: Wrinkles appearing earlier than expected for your age
Over-the-counter products show no improvement after 3 months
Want professional assessment of skin aging

statistics.onset: First wrinkles typically appear in late 20s to early 30s
statistics.sunDamage: Up to 80% of facial aging is caused by UV exposure
statistics.smoking: Smokers develop wrinkles 10 years earlier than non-smokers

types.dynamic: Wrinkles that appear with facial movements (expression lines)
types.static: Wrinkles visible even when face is at rest
types.gravityLines: Wrinkles caused by loss of skin elasticity and gravity
types.atrophic: Fine wrinkles in thin, fragile skin

locations.crowsFeet: Lines radiating from outer corners of eyes
locations.bunnyLines: Lines on nose bridge when smiling
locations.marionette: Lines from mouth corners down to chin
locations.nasolabial: Lines from nose to mouth corners (smile lines)
locations.lipLines: Vertical lines above upper lip (smoker's lines)

myths.fact: While aging causes wrinkles, lifestyle factors like sun protection, not smoking, and proper skincare can significantly delay and minimize wrinkles.

myths.myth: Expensive creams can completely eliminate wrinkles
myths.fact: While quality skincare can improve appearance, only medical procedures (Botox, fillers, lasers) can significantly reduce deep wrinkles.

myths.myth: You should wait until 40s to treat wrinkles
myths.fact: Prevention starting in 20s-30s is more effective than trying to reverse severe wrinkles later.
Facial exercises can actually increase wrinkles by repeated folding of skin. Botox works by reducing facial movements.

evening: Oil cleanser (double cleanse if wearing SPF)
